BackstoryDef.title: Frontier ranger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Before joining the colony, [PAWN_nameDef] lived alone on the frontier, tracking smugglers and beasts across dust plains and frozen ridges. [PAWN_pronoun] learned to read weather, wind, and footprints better than faces. Years of silence made [PAWN_pronoun] wary of crowds but unmatched in survival instinct.

BackstoryDef.title: Trench sapper
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent years beneath the earth, carving tunnels under enemy lines and setting shaped charges. The constant rumble of artillery became background noise. When peace came, [PAWN_pronoun] still built foxholes before sleeping — just in case.

BackstoryDef.title: Quartermaster sergeant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Every bullet, every bandage - [PAWN_nameDef] knew where it came from and where it was going. Years in logistics turned [PAWN_pronoun] into a walking inventory, but that precision never left room for patience. When things went missing, someone always paid for it.

BackstoryDef.title: Trench medic
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: There were days when the blood never washed off. [PAWN_nameDef] tended the wounded by lamplight, sewing skin with trembling hands while the guns thundered overhead. Compassion hardened into efficiency — quick hands, empty heart.

BackstoryDef.title: Armory artificer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] could turn scrap metal into a working rifle faster than most could find the safety switch. In the regiment’s armory, [PAWN_pronoun] built weapons out of boredom and repaired them out of habit. Noise didn’t bother [PAWN_objective]; people did.

BackstoryDef.title: Field chaplain
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Between bombardments, [PAWN_nameDef] spoke of peace. Few listened, but [PAWN_pronoun] stayed - tending to the shaken, burying the dead, and keeping faith alive where nothing else could grow. Even now, [PAWN_pronoun] can’t touch a weapon without flinching.

BackstoryDef.title: Colony engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Settlements rose and fell under [PAWN_nameDef]’s hands. From crude barricades to geothermal plants, [PAWN_pronoun] built them all. The work was loud and dangerous — just how [PAWN_pronoun] liked it. Talking wasn’t part of the job description.

BackstoryDef.title: Recon scout
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] moved like a ghost ahead of the lines, reporting movement, sabotage, and weather. Sleep came in ten-minute bursts, and meals were whatever didn’t move faster than [PAWN_objective]. In groups, [PAWN_pronoun] still keeps to the edges.

BackstoryDef.title: Broadcast operator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The signal never stopped. [PAWN_nameDef] sat in dim rooms with flickering monitors, rerouting transmissions and decoding garbled distress calls. Even after leaving the post, [PAWN_pronoun] swears [PAWN_pronoun] can still hear the static at night.

BackstoryDef.title: Surveyor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] mapped uncharted worlds for the Offworld League, spending months in drop-pods with only scanners and silence for company. [PAWN_pronoun] learned patience, precision, and the comfort of solitude — all of which make teamwork difficult now.
